pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, August 22, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Nanaimo, British Columbia 

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Retreat.

Vancouver Island Conference Centre

Note for media:

  • Coverage of the Cabinet Retreat is open to accredited media only. If you have not obtained Cabinet Retreat accreditation in advance, please email media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca no later than 8:00 p.m. on August 21.
